attributes.action: Stop the cancellation of the Number 55 Bus Route - Southmead to Bristol City Centre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The local bus company First Group are withdrawing the number 55 route.
This bus route is the only service between Southmead Bristol and City Centre Bristol, which goes through Westbury-on-Trym Bristol.
This service is required because those without their own transport will not be able to get to:-
The local housing office of 'Bristol City Council'
The local 'Main Post Office', which includes the letter, parcel collection office for undelivered post.
